name: unhealthily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not good for your health: She is unhealthily thin. Nowadays, children have become less active and eat unhealthily.
in a way that is not good for someone or not acceptable because it does not seem normal: He has become unhealthily obsessed with her. See
unhealthy
More examplesFewer examplesMany ready meals still have unhealthily high levels of salt and fat.People have all the information they need and they still live unhealthily.She grew unhealthily dependent on her daughter and only child, Helen.Their relationship is unhealthily antagonistic.
